Package org.magelan.core.style

Interface Summary
LineStyle Defines common linestyle characteristics.
NamedStyle A named style.
TextStyle A text style definition.
 

Class Summary
AbstractNamedStyle A named style.
DefaultLineStyle Defines the default linestyle.
DefaultLineStyleBeanInfo LineStyle bean info class.
DefaultTextStyle Default text style.
DefaultTextStyleBeanInfo DefaultTextStyle bean info class.
Layer Layers specify default color, linestyle and thickness of their entities.
LayerBeanInfo Layer bean info class.
